column5: Our property is an older, rustic cabin originally built in the 30's in the Avant campground in Concan, Texas. The cabin was built by my grandfather Arthur Avant and has always been in our family. Walking distance and access to the Frio River ( approx. 100 yards). 8 miles to Garner State Park. Nearby activities include kayaking, nightly dances, summer concerts, cafes and shopping.
